abilities.description: Robin can sprout multiple legs from surfaces to create platforms, attack, or support allies.

keyMoments.title: Pierna Fleur Debuts
keyMoments.description: Robin debuts the ability to sprout legs using her Devil Fruit, not just arms.
keyMoments.significance: Expands the known applications of the Hana Hana no Mi.

abilities.description: Moria can command zombies animated with stolen shadows, as demonstrated with Oars in this episode.

keyMoments.title: Moria Commands Oars
keyMoments.description: Moria uses his Devil Fruit power to give direct orders to Oars, demonstrating his control over shadow-animated zombies.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the extent of Moria's control over his zombie army.
